mapper.select: SELECT u.ID as userID,u.ADMINNAME,u.ADMINPWD,u.TRUENAME,u.AREAID, g.id,g,name,g.parentId,g.enName,g.groupType,g.status,g.orderId,g.memo,g.roleId FROM OTT_ADMIN u left join ott_qx_groupuser gu on u.ID = gu.userid left join ott_qx_group g on g.id = gu.groupid WHERE g.id = #{id}

UPDATE ott_qx_group SET name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parentId = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enName = #{enName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, groupType = #{groupType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orderId = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, roleId = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT * FROM ott_qx_group WHERE enName = #{enName} order by id desc
SELECT * FROM ott_qx_group g where g.status = '1' order by g.id desc
SELECT t.id,t.name FROM ott_qx_group t where t.id not in (select g.groupid from ott_qx_grouprole g where g.roleid=#{id}) and t.status = '1'
SELECT t.id,t.name FROM ott_qx_group t where t.id not in (select g.groupid from ott_qx_groupuser g where g.userid=#{id}) and t.status = '1'
